title: Redesigning Health Education for University Student Well-Being: Mixed-Methods Intensive Short Course

context.additional_context: A course for undergraduate mathematics majors to strengthen well-being practices and health management skills, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessments in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Students can identify and explain physical and mental well-being implementation strategies with ≥80% accuracy
Learners can develop personalized wellness plans and submit project-specific performance reports
Over 75% of participating students demonstrate a 15% or greater improvement in wellness practice scores (nutrition/exercise/safety, etc.) after completing the course
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
